programmes.show_description: This Is CBeebies. Programmes start at 6.00am.
Comic Cut. Tish is saddened to find out her favourite comic is no longer being published.
Boo. Children's animation. Coco shows Bing how to do really good big boos, and together they make Flop jump. Bing then finds out the power of boo has to be scaled down for babies.
Picnic. Preschool series. The Teletubbies go on a special picnic together. Lots of tubby toast pops out of the Dup Dup and lands on the picnic plates for the Teletubbies to munch.
Workout. Preschool animation about a baby monkey and his mother. Mo is trying to exercise, and Tee wants to get involved.
Chilli to the Rescue. Chilli becomes Super Chilli as he tries to be a superhero just like Supertato.
Story. Bing and Coco have a disagreement over what story to read to Charlie.
Ready, Sheddy, Go. Nori and Dot are stuck in a treehouse without a door. How can Mojo and Bo get them out? By sending the treehouse flying across town, that's how!
Ladybird's Game Show. Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.
The Pen Pal Badge. Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals.
Sheepdog. Dad agrees to play sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum.
Tickle Crabs. When Dad brings a pair of tenacious tickle crabs home from the beach, nowhere in the house is safe! His only hope of escaping their tickles is with the help of his true love.
Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica. The Go Jetters are in trouble when Glitch's feather collecting mission goes wrong.
The Tale of the Uninvited Badger. Animated series. Tommy Brock shelters by the fire inside the Bouncer's Burrow. Peter and his friends must find a way to get the grumpy badger out.
Missing Shell. It's an underwater mystery when a valuable protective shell goes missing.
Octonaughty and the Fractionator. Octonaughty uses his new invention, the Fractionator, to break into The Museum of Numbers to steal the Golden Infinity. But has he met his match?
Alphablocks A-Z. Meet the Alphablocks! From accident-prone A to sleepy Z, all twenty-six letters are full of fun and ready for adventure.   Followed by Tiny Wonders.
Superhero. Test your superpowers with my awesome Superhero Challenge. We've assembled climbers, squats and runners. The supervillain is the Activate!
Mud. Bella and Lift visit the Cloud Kitchen, where Patch is busy with the Playtimers making a tasty treat called Munchy Muddy Meadows.
Apple. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Apple singing in celebration of her great-great-grandad Apple Tree's hundredth birthday.
Dandelion. Children's animation. After blowing the seeds off some dandelions, Bing decides to take one to Sula. Bing negotiates many windy hazards to keep the dandelion safe.
Flower. Dee encourages a friend to say 'flower', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a pink flower, a yellow flower, a frilly flower and silly squirty flowers too!
Bright Beetle Lu. Lu struggles to do all the things she wants to do in her new costume.
Garden Helpers. Fiona calls the Piggies to help tidy up her garden, but they bring along a game that drives them crazy. Can they manage to work and play without causing a big mess?
More About Rolling. Stop-motion preschool programme. The Twirlywoos watch a man who is putting a poster up on a billboard. Toodloo shows her balancing skills.
Pairs. Justin meets a pair of twins, and Mr Tumble orders a pair of everything for breakfast!
Wait for It. Preschool series. The Teletubbies wait for tubby toast, the Tubby Phone and the Tiddlytubbies, while a boy in Tummy Tales waits for a bus with his grandad.
Getting Dressed. Grown-ups and babies explore getting dressed as they play and share a story together.
Garden Centre. Elsee plays I-spy in a garden centre with her new friend Karlie.
Bubbles. It's bath time, and Maddie and Triggs embark on a bubble-tastic submarine adventure to the bottom of the ocean in search of Triggs's favourite bath toy, Denis the Ducky.
Sports Commentator. Dylan the sports commentator wants to ask the winner of the race an interesting question - but he needs to figure out who won!
The Bravest Thing. When Lou is attacked by a bully, he bravely retaliates with a song.
Bubble Trouble. Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes go on an underwater adventure inside a rubbery bubble.
Work. In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.
The Tree Badge. Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live among them, and earn their tree badges in the process!
A Burst of Colour. The Game Catchers have special powers on a new planet that's grey.
Timmy's Treasure Trail. Animated adventures of a young lamb at nursery school. Harriet and Osbourne lay a treasure trail for the class, but Kid spoils the fun by eating the clues.
Iona and Elba's Family Fun Day. Iona and Elba kickstart their day with a fabulous family breakfast of perfect pancakes!
Esmae's Norfolk Fish. Esmae invites her friends to a special seaside themed meal, complete with everyone's favourite seaside food: fish served with sweet potato wedges and tartar sauce.

programmes.show_name: Teeny Tiny Creatures with Chantelle and Rory
programmes.show_description: Robins. Chantelle is listening for birds while Rory and Sandy are birdspotting.
Mission: Day Off. Sylvie and Katrina stop to help Dawn from the toy shop, Harry the baker and Pete the postie on their way to the park caf√© on their day off.
Cheetah and Warthog. Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal the surprising ways in which they are connected in the wild. This time, it's cheetahs and warthogs.
Waffle's Great Escape. Mrs Hobbs is looking after Waffle, but he tries to escape to join Evie at school.
y. Dee encourages a friend to say 'y', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They see some yo-yos and a yacht, do some yoga and even meet a yeti!
Octoblock and the Path of Justice. Octonaughty is up to no good in the town centre, so Octoblock sets out to track him down. Using a map, he finds his way - but will he reach it in time?
Fit. Educational fun. H needs a helping hand to heave herself up the hill, so I turns instructor for an incredible workout.
The Breakfast Bears. The Three Bears are struggling to make their breakfast in the right order because they all want to go first! Go, Stop and the Breakfast Crew help them figure things out.
Choosing Colours. Red and Blue choose colours for their playhouses. Learn about making colour choices.
The Medicine Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee is not very well. He has lost his voice. The Squirrels want to make him feel better, so they ask the other animals for advice.
Sunrise. Stripes and Toad want to write a song together, but they fall out. Can Yukee help them?
Animal Keeper. Educational series using Makaton sign language. Today, Justin and his friend are animal keepers at an animal park. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble is caring for an animal too.
Party! Preschool series. It's party time! The Teletubbies have balloons, party blowers and lots of sparkles. In Tummy Tales, twins celebrate their birthday with their friends.
Monkey. Preschool series about animals that live together on a patchwork blanket. Patchwork Monkey is teasing the other Patchwork Pals! Will they find a way to handle him?
Raa Raa and the Noisy Story. Animation set in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Topsy gets upset when she wants to tell her friends her favourite story but they noisily interrupt her.
The Old-Fashioned Way. Koko has Old Puffer Pete feeling like his old ways are methodical and too slow.
Episode 23. Comedy sketch show for younger viewers. Intrepid location reporter Gail Force reports from a football match and zany scientist Professor Muddles experiments with a jumping banana.
Cool Moving Machines. Grace shows off three amazing machines that all move in really cool ways.
Well Done, Nina! The Game Catchers land on a mountainous planet to play the handkerchief challenge.
Mimic Octopus. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. The Octonauts recruit a shape-shifting mimic octopus to help them on a mission.
The Tale of Nutkin on the Run. Animated series. When Squirrel Nutkin angers Old Brown by taking his glasses, it is up to Peter and his friends to put things right.
The Camping Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee and the Squirrels go camping, but it's not as easy as they thought it would be.
The Mamas' Spa Day. When some exhausted mums arrive at the clinic, Vida knows just what they need to relax.
Turnip of Terror. Supertato and the Veggies are shocked when they meet a turnip in the deli counter.
Mission Cloning. Weasy clones himself so that he can play on his new game console and avoid dad duties.
The Chickening. Carrying a giant chicken to the country fair proves trickier than Mojo and Bo expected!
Sheepdog. Dad agrees to play sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum.
Queens. During a game of queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.
Nugget's Muddy Mishap. When Nugget's teddy gets accidentally washed, the Piris try to recreate its unique smell.
Andy and the Giraffe. Preschool wildlife series. Andy is in Namibia, hunting for giraffe thorn tree seeds. And what better way to do that than from the top of a giraffe itself!
Waffle's Wonderful Art. Preschool comedy drama series. Waffle discovers he has a talent for painting Mrs Hobbs's cat, George, and decides it could be a way to get in her good books.
The Cherry Tree Wish. Rafi's cherry tree grows too fast. She discovers nature likes to take its time.
It's Time for a Special Visitor. There's a family get-together when Great Gran Gran comes to visit from St Lucia. JoJo has a whole day of activities planned.
Moon's Exhibition. Animation. A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.
The Little Chill. Stop-motion animation. It's a very cold day on the Clangers' planet, and the Sky Moos are frozen outside! Granny comes to the rescue with a plan to keep them warm.
Wheels. MeMo and BaBa have fun playing with cars and discovering the joy of motion. MeMo loves making the wheels go round, while BaBa loves to be pushed along.
Upsy Daisy Only Wants to Sing. In a magical forest, characters have adventures. Makka Pakka wants to wash Upsy Daisy's face, Igglepiggle wants to play, and Upsy Daisy wants to sing.
Cody Rhodes - Gigantic. Are you ready to turn the page? Cody Rhodes reads a Bedtime Story about a little whale with a big heart.
This Is CBeebies. Programmes start at 6.00am.
Baby Jake Loves to Say Hello. The adventures of magical Baby Jake and friends. Baby Jake and Nibbles the Rabbit go on an orchard adventure and enjoy saying hello.
Dover, England. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk.
Cake. Children's animation. Bing's friends are coming to his house for a cake party. Bing can't wait to show Sula the cake he's made, but he accidentally tips the cake off its stand.
Party All Day Day. Love Monster wants to make sure he does all the activities on Party All Day Day, but he starts to feel tired before his favourite bit - the conga!
Pizzas Away. Mojo needs to deliver a pizza to a very hard-to-reach island, but some stubborn seabirds have their eye on the pizza. Will Mojo have to go supersonic to get past them?
My Hero. When Brewster's hero can't make it for Hero Day, he and Zephie set off on their own hero duty and learn what makes a real hero along the way. .
Hot Bubble Bath. Ginger and the Pea-Rexes seek help from Watermelonsuchus to plug an underwater air vent.   Followed by My Petsaurus.
Spinach. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the exceptional painter Spinach creating Kiwi's portrait, if Kiwi can keep still.
Broccoli Flies Again. Broccoli learns to fly, but her paper plane takes her right into Evil Pea's freezer.
Hippity Hoppity, Voosh. Children's animation. Bing and Sula are playing a vooshing game with their favourite toys. They throw them into the air to see how high they can fly.
Story. Bing and Coco have a disagreement over what story to read to Charlie.
The Puzzle Badge. The Squirrels are close to finishing a jigsaw puzzle.
The Action Hero Badge. The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket who always saves the day by smashing and crashing things. But there are other ways to save the day!
Waitomo Glow-worm Caves, New Zealand. Animated adventure comedy series. It's Go Jetters glow when Glitch uses some glow-worms for his disco pizzazz in New Zealand.
The Tale of the Big Move. Animated series. When Lily's father decides to move the family away, Peter comes up with a clever but dangerous plan to change Dr Bobtail's mind.
The Enormous Elephant Seal. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. Peso and the Octonauts help an enormous elephant seal.
UFO. Mojo and Bo only wanted to help fix a satellite dish with Mojo's chopper top. Now they've been mistaken for a UFO, and the whole town is in a tizzy about invading aliens!
The Zen Den. Sophie must infiltrate the sports hall without disturbing a relaxation class Val is running. Her aim is to retrieve bibs, goals and a big bag of footballs.
Time for Bed. Maddie visits Effie to help her get Teddy ready for bed. Mr Tumble is feeling sleepy too, and he tries to take a nap.
Bumpy and the Wise Old Wolfhound. Bingo is sick in hospital, so Bluey and Dad send her a homemade video to lift her spirits.
Unicorse. Bluey's bedtime story is disturbed by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world.
The Breakfast Badge. Tag is feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast. Luckily, Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.
The Family Photo Badge. The Squirrels learn that friends can be like family, and take a brilliant group photo!
Slimy Sammy. Flutter buys a new fishy pet from slippery salesman Mervyn, but the Piripenguins get stuck in its gloopy slime. Can the friends find a solution to their sticky situation?
Big Lizard's Big Itch. Big Lizard isn't happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises that's exactly what he needs to do. He's shedding his skin!
Hot Potatodon. Ginger's baby Broccolisaurus friend kicks their ball into Potatodon territory.
Go Jet Academy: Biogas Power. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! Glitch causes chaos at the academy when he loses control of his new biogas boosters.
Mission Rollercoaster. Weasy is banned from playing on the Ducklings' mini train but decides to go up a level.
Go Dino-Webs Go!/Ghost in the Museum. Team Spidey gets dino power. A ghost haunts the museum.
Arabian Camels. When Paani goes missing in the desert, Dashi calls for back-up before he runs out of water.
Power. Butterflies on Stanley's solar panels mean he has no power for his vehicles or his Can-Bots! Luckily, Seamus and Little Woo know a thing or two about butterflies.
Waltzing Potato. Evil Pea plans to freeze Supertato into an ice cube by pretending to teach him to dance.

programmes.show_name: New: Talking Tom Heroes: Suddenly Super
programmes.show_description: Angela and the Super Plant. The Heroes find themselves battling a rogue plant.
T-Rex and Imprint. Children's dinosaur history series. Andy travels back 65 million years to North America in the time of Tyrannosaurus rex.
Ada the Artist. Jen is trying to paint a cheetah, but she runs out of paint for the spots.
Allotments. Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about allotments.
Cheetah and Warthog. Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal the surprising ways in which they are connected in the wild. This time, it's cheetahs and warthogs.
Waffle's Doggy Disco. A loud disco disrupts after-school club, but George has a solution, so Waffle can join in.
The Paper Boat Badge. Animated preschool series. Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make a paper boat out of newspaper, and they help some ants get to the other side of the pond.
Sea Snakes. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. A poisonous sea krait lays her eggs in the garden pod.
Zigzag's Buddy Worry. Zigzag's buddy doesn't feel like coming out to play, but Vida gets him exercising!
Lambert-Fisher Glacier, Antarctica. Animated adventure comedy series. When Grandmaster Glitch builds his effigy in ice, his digging threatens the Lambert Glacier in Antarctica.
The First Wish. On her seventh birthday, Rafi receives her very first wishing wand. With a few important rules to learn, Rafi is ready to make some very exciting wishes.
The Bouncy Wish. Rafi's wish for trampoline feet makes bouncing fun, until it becomes too much. With her dads' help, she realises asking for support brings laughter, pancakes and hugs.
Fly Away Feathers. Yukee and the garden gang help a touring musical pigeon get back in the air.
Peas. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the Peas performing their hap-pea double act and showing that, although they look alike, they definitely don't think alike.
Fruity Fun. Justin and friends go fruit picking, and Aunt Polly judges the Fabulous Fruit Competition.
Outer Space. Toddlers and their grown-ups play with outer space things, sing songs and enjoy a story.
The Something Something. Kiri and Lou decide to take Pania a giant fruit as a present. But as they bring it to her, they can't resist having a taste of it - and another, and another...
Kitty Builder. Impatient Kitty tries to build a machine alone, which leads to chaos.
Mission: Pet Shop. Hearing dog Diesel is on a mission to get some dog food and a new toy from the pet shop.
Noing! Preschool animation. Tee can't stop playing his favourite game on Mo's tablet. How is Mo going to convince him that it's just as much fun playing outside?
The Musical Cow. The Game Catchers land on a cartoon-like planet to play hit the can.
Forest. Elsee plays I-spy in a beautiful forest with her new friend Raffaella.
Sea Captain. Dylan wants to be the best captain ever, but he soon discovers a sea captain is nothing without his crew!
It Came from Planet Boogie. A crashed meteor in the town square makes every machine in Swoppiton dance... even Mojo!
Delivery. Stan helps Hattie, Fred and Fifi set up a food delivery service.
Spooky Day. Supertato is scared when Pumpkin tries to make friends with him.
Tall Tales. Brinicle gets a job as a news reporter but starts inventing stories to boost his ratings - until he realises his tall tales are misleading the other penguins.
Svalbard Global Seed Vault, Norway. When Ubercorn gets trapped inside an icy mountain, Glitch has to save his old teammate.
Romeo and Juliet. Children's sign language poetry series. To celebrate the 400-year legacy of William Shakespeare, Donna and Simon discover the story of Romeo and Juliet.
Juno's Quiet Friend. Vida helps a baby bird who feels too shy to talk.
A Big Day Out for D.O.R.I.S. Dad gets trapped in the shower when D.O.R.I.S. decides to visit the sea. Can Big Lizard and Cosima stop her before she does herself permanent damage?
Flat-Pack. While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.
Nikhil and Jay and the Portrait. Jay tries to stay still so that Nikhil can paint a portrait of him - but it's hard!
It's Time for a Community Newsletter. JoJo and Gran Gran make a community newsletter.
Woollen Music. Animation. Sarah and her best friend Duck embark on simple but exciting adventures. Scarf Lady's jukebox inspires a knitted instrument band.
I Like My Hair Completely the Way it Is. Children's animation. Join Lola and Charlie, a brother and sister, as they deal with everyday topics. Lola does not want a haircut.
Let's Have a Race! Moon Baby, Pepi Nana and all the friends find a toy roundabout has been left in the Toy House. Each chooses a vehicle to ride in and they have a race.
Baby Tweety. MeMo and BaBa look after Baby Tweety on a play date. They have lots of fun playing hide-and-seek and giving Baby Tweety some food. Looking after little ones can be tiring.
The Tombliboo's Busy Ninky Nonk Day. In a magical forest, colourful characters have adventures. The Tombliboos ride the Ninky Nonk and it stops in a lovely part of the garden.
Chris Hemsworth - Stormy Night. Brave the storm with Chris Hemsworth, as he reads a Bedtime Story about a little bear who overcomes his fear of thunder.
